00061   GraphCollection_t(const GraphCollection_t &a) 
00062     : _graphCol(a._graphCol),
00063       _nGraphs(a._nGraphs),
00064       _majorIndex(0),
00065       _nTypes(a._nTypes)
00066   {
00067     if (a._majorIndex) {
00068       _majorIndex=new lcio::IntVec;
00069       _majorIndex->assign(a._majorIndex->begin(),a._majorIndex->end());
00070     }
00071     
00072     // the names are only copied if they are needed.
00073     // _typeNameList.assign(a._typeNameList.begin(),a._typeNameList.end());
00074     // _nameList.assign(a._nameList.begin(),a._nameList.end());
00075   };
00076 
00077   // default constructor
00078   GraphCollection_t() 
00079     : _graphCol(0),
00080       _nGraphs(0),
00081       _majorIndex(0),
00082       _nTypes(0)
00083   {};
00084     
00085   ~GraphCollection_t() {
00086     // the histogram may not be owned by this wrapper, so it must not be deleted automatically.
00087     // The major index is always owned by this wrapper, so it should be deleted
00088     delete _majorIndex;
00089   }
00090 
00094   void deleteCollection() {
00095     delete _graphCol;
00096     _graphCol=0;
00097     delete _majorIndex;
00098     _majorIndex=0;
00099   };
00100 
00101   void deleteSharedStorage() {
00102     deleteCollection();
00103   }

00123   unsigned int n() const {
00124     return _nGraphs;
00125   }
00126 
00130   bool is2D() const {
00131     return _majorIndex && _majorIndex->size()>1;
00132   };
00133 
00134   /* Get the number of graph types.
00135    * nTypes() times n() graphs are created.
00136    */
00137   unsigned int nTypes() const {
00138     return _nTypes;
00139   }
00140 
00144   unsigned int nMajor() const {
00145 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00146     assert(_majorIndex);
00147 #endif
00148     return _majorIndex->size()-1;
00149   };
00150 
00154   unsigned int nMinor(unsigned int major_index) const {
00155 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00156     assert (major_index+1 < _majorIndex->size());
00157 #endif
00158     return (*_majorIndex)[major_index+1]-(*_majorIndex)[major_index];
00159   };

00204   unsigned int appendXValue(double x_value) {
00205     //      lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *x_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(0));
00206     //      unsigned int n_elements=x_graph->getNDouble();
00207     //      x_graph->setDoubleVal(n_elements,x_value);
00208     return appendValue(0,x_value);
00209   }

00211 protected:
00214   unsigned int appendFloatValue(unsigned int full_index, float a_value) {
00215 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00216     assert ( full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()) );
00217 #endif
00218     lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *x_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00219     unsigned int n_elements=x_graph->getNFloat();
00220     x_graph->setFloatVal(n_elements,a_value);
00221     return n_elements;
00222   }
00223 
00226   unsigned int appendValue(unsigned int full_index, double a_value) {
00227 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00228     assert ( full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()) );
00229 #endif
00230     lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *x_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00231     unsigned int n_elements=x_graph->getNDouble();
00232     x_graph->setDoubleVal(n_elements,a_value);
00233     return n_elements;
00234   }

00239   void setFloatValue(unsigned int full_index, unsigned int value_index, float a_value) {
00240 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00241     assert (full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()));
00242 #endif
00243     lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *a_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00244 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00245     unsigned int n_elements=a_graph->getNFloat();
00246     assert (value_index < n_elements+1);
00247 #endif
00248     a_graph->setFloatVal(value_index,a_value);
00249   }
00250 
00253   void setValue(unsigned int full_index, unsigned int value_index, float a_value) {
00254 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00255     assert (full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()));
00256 #endif
00257     lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *a_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00258 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00259     unsigned int n_elements=a_graph->getNDouble();
00260     assert (value_index < n_elements+1);
00261 #endif
00262     a_graph->setDoubleVal(value_index,a_value);
00263   }
00264 
00267   double getValue(unsigned int full_index, unsigned int value_index) const {
00268 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00269     assert (full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()));
00270 #endif
00271     lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *a_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00272 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00273     unsigned int n_elements=a_graph->getNDouble();
00274     assert (value_index < n_elements+1);
00275 #endif
00276     return a_graph->getDoubleVal(value_index);
00277   }

00281   double getFloatValue(unsigned int full_index, unsigned int value_index) const {
00282 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00283     assert (full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()));
00284 #endif
00285     lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *a_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00286 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00287     unsigned int n_elements=a_graph->getNFloat();
00288     assert (value_index < n_elements+1);
00289 #endif
00290     return a_graph->getFloatVal(value_index);
00291   }
00292 
00295   void addToFloatValue(unsigned int full_index, unsigned int value_index, float a_value) {
00296 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00297     assert (full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()));
00298 #endif
00299     lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *a_graph=static_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00300 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00301     unsigned int n_elements=a_graph->getNFloat();
00302     assert (value_index < n_elements+1);
00303 #endif
00304     a_graph->setFloatVal(value_index,a_graph->getFloatVal(value_index)+a_value);
00305   }
00306 
00309   unsigned int getIndex(unsigned int major_index, unsigned int minor_index, unsigned int type_index) const {
00310 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00311     if (!is2D()) {
00312       std::stringstream message;
00313       message << "GraphCollection::addYValue> Major index specified but graph group has only one dimension.";
00314       throw std::logic_error(message.str());
00315     }
00316     assert (major_index+1 < _majorIndex->size());
00317     assert (minor_index   < static_cast<unsigned int>((*_majorIndex)[major_index + 1]));
00318     assert (type_index < nTypes());
00319 #endif
00320     return ((*_majorIndex)[major_index]+minor_index)*nTypes()+type_index+1;
00321   }
00322 
00325   unsigned int getIndex(unsigned int index, unsigned int type_index) const{
00326 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00327     if (is2D()) {
00328       std::stringstream message;
00329       message << "GraphCollection::addYValue> Major index specified but graph group, has only one dimension.";
00330       throw std::logic_error(message.str());
00331     }
00332     assert (index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()));
00333     assert (type_index < nTypes());
00334 #endif
00335     return index*nTypes()+type_index+1;
00336   }
00337 
00338 public:
00341   void setYValue(unsigned int major_index, unsigned int minor_index, unsigned int type_index, unsigned int value_index, float a_value) {
00342     unsigned int full_index=getIndex(major_index, minor_index, type_index);
00343     setFloatValue(full_index,value_index, a_value);
00344       
00345   }
00346 
00349   void setYValue(unsigned int index, unsigned int type_index, unsigned int value_index, float a_value) {
00350     unsigned int full_index=getIndex(index, type_index);
00351     setFloatValue(full_index, value_index, a_value);
00352   }
00353 
00356   float getYValue(unsigned int index, unsigned int type_index, unsigned int value_index) const {
00357     unsigned int full_index=getIndex(index, type_index);
00358     return getFloatValue(full_index, value_index);
00359   }
00360 
00363   float getYValue(unsigned int major_index, unsigned int minor_index, unsigned int type_index, unsigned int value_index) const {
00364     unsigned int full_index=getIndex(major_index, minor_index, type_index);
00365     return getFloatValue(full_index, value_index);
00366   }
00367 
00370   double getXValue(unsigned int index, unsigned int value_index) const {
00371     unsigned int full_index=getIndex(index, 0);
00372     return getValue(full_index, value_index);
00373   }

00375 
00381   const std::string &getName(unsigned int major_index) const {
00382     if (_nameList.empty()) copyNames();
00383     if (_nameList.size()==1) {
00384       return _nameList[0];
00385     }
00386 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00387     assert( major_index < _nameList.size());
00388 #endif
00389     return _nameList[major_index];
00390   };
00391 
00397   const std::string &getTypeName(unsigned int type_index) const {
00398     if (_typeNameList.empty()) {
00399       _graphCol->getParameters().getStringVals(__typeNameParameterName,_typeNameList);
00400       if (_typeNameList.empty()) {
00401         _typeNameList.push_back("");
00402       }
00403     }
00404 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00405     assert( type_index < _typeNameList.size());
00406 #endif
00407     return _typeNameList[type_index];
00408   }
00409 
00410 protected:
00411   EVENT::LCGenericObject *getXArray() {
00412     return getArray(0);
00413   }
00414 
00415   EVENT::LCGenericObject *getArray(unsigned int full_index) {
00416 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00417     assert(_graphCol);
00418     assert( full_index < static_cast<unsigned int>(_graphCol->getNumberOfElements()));
00419 #endif
00420     return dynamic_cast<EVENT::LCGenericObject *>(_graphCol->getElementAt(full_index));
00421   }

00444   void copyNames() const {
00445     if (_nameList.empty()) {
00446       _graphCol->getParameters().getStringVals(__graphNameParameterName,_nameList);
00447       if (_nameList.empty()) {
00448         _nameList.push_back(__defaultGraphName);
00449       }
00450 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00451      assert(_nameList.size()==1 || _nameList.size() == nMajor());
00452 #endif
00453     }
00454   }
